document.full_text: as fraud surfaced in the afghan election, the no. 2 u.n. official in the country, peter w. galbraith, proposed enlisting the white house in a plan to replace hamid karzai.
document.title: u.n. officials say american offered plan to replace karzai
lines_and_colors: as fraud surfaced in the afghan election, the no. 2 u.n. official in the country, peter w. galbraith, proposed enlisting the white house in a plan to replace hamid karzai.
